title: VTOLs
contents: What's that in the sky? ... It's a VTOL unit
VTOLs are used similarly to ground units. However, they do have a few differences.
To produce VTOL units, youâ€™ll need to have discovered / researched the "VTOL Propulsion" and "VTOL Factory".
You should also research and build a few "VTOL Rearming Pads", so your VTOL units can reload ammo.
